question: i have written before in this forum and i want to thank the eye Dr. for replying, i have been having episodes of vision disturbances very severe headaches, nausea, really bad back pain,  like a metal band round my lower back, and a feeling that my body was a lump of lead! i had flashing jagged lines darting across my eyes, this is the first thing that happens in these episodes,  i have had 4 of these in 3 weeks,  they are most definately  worse every time,   in fact the first time i had perifual vision in my left eye and a headache!!   i am Irish but live in Jamaica and even though i'm living in a developing third world country i have seen a GP twice,  an EKG, as i have blood pressure and am on tablets for this,  i had diabetes tests done and blood test, i saw 2 eye Dr.s  and a neurologist twice, i had a cat scan and an MRI all within a week and a half!!  i can not complain about the treatment i have got but what should i do now, all these test have come back clear, i don't know what i should do next the last episode was really awful i really thought i was going to die, when i woke up the next morning i was so glad to see another day!!  that is when i had the really terrible pain in my lower back and was very nausea.  the only test i am waiting on is an autoimmune antibody blood test, which will be back in about a week,  is there anything else i can do, please help i am so afraid of this severe attack coming back again!!Thank you
